about-me.headline: Who I Am
about-me.main-text: With me as a fullstack developer, your company will gain a structured, responsible and team-oriented employee. I also possess analytical thinking skills.
about-me.location: I live in Wolfenbüttel, am mobile and also open to working from home.
about-me.mind: The feeling of solving a problem is what motivates me.
about-me.hook: I always dedicate myself to my new tasks and challenges with great motivation and full commitment.

skill-set.headline: Technologies
skill-set.main-text: I have already familiarized myself with several frontend and backend technologies in group and solo projects.  The skills that I require every day include JavaScript, HTML, SCSS, TypeScript, Angular, Python, Django and Git.
skill-set.main-text-second: I am happy to learn new skills and pick up new technologies that you need.
skill-set.speech-bubble: I have a special interest in learning

projects.headline: Projects
projects.main-text: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skills in action.
projects.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
projects.game: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.bubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
projects.coderr: Coderr is a social media platform for freelance developers and clients to share offers, place orders, receive feedback, and network. Users can create profiles, post projects, and rate other developers.
projects.quizzly: Quizzly is a quiz application that allows users to generate their own quizzes using GeminiAI. Users provide a link to a YouTube video, and the application automatically creates a quiz based on the content of the video.
projects.videoflix: Videoflix is a streaming platform that allows users to watch movies and series online. With a user-friendly interface, categorical search, and a potentially extensive library, Videoflix offers a seamless entertainment experience.

start.headline: In the beginning
start.text: From an early age, I was repeatedly drawn to programming. From Unity, Assembler, C++ and Arduino to web development. The latter fascinated me in particular, which prompted me to program my own snake game, which I further developed part-time for almost a year. This was the starting point for my passion as a developer and led me to the Developer Akademie.

at-now.headline: Now
at-now.text: I have successfully completed the demanding training to become a fullstack developer at the Developer Akademie and am currently working on various own projects to further deepen my skills. I mainly rely on JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, Python and Django.

future.headline: Future
future.text: In future, I would like to work on exciting projects that further develop my skills as a developer. To build up my skills, I plan to further develop myself in the field of DevSecOps. I look forward to expanding my skills and learning new ones in the future. Perhaps with you?

contact.headline: Contact me
contact.question: Got a problem to solve?
contact.main-text: Contact me using the form opposite. I look forward to hearing from you and creating added value in your projects with my work.

name.headline: What's your name?
name.err: Oops! It seems your name is missing.
name.title: Allowed special characters: . - /

message.headline: How can I help you?
message.placeholder: Hey Nicolas, I am interested in...
message.err: What do you need to develop?
